short_summary: Firewood supply and delivery to Jasper National Park
description: The Government of Canada is seeking goods or services to enable the delivery of firewood to six (6) campgrounds, one (1) woodlot, and one (1) day use area in Jasper National Park.
duration_in_months: The anticipated duration of this opportunity is 12 months, which starts from January 1st, 2023, to February 28th, 2024.
